annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COMMISSION DECISION
annotations.translation: 委员会决定

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 17 August 2005

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: on the monitoring and evaluation of the labour rights situation in Belarus for temporary withdrawal of trade preferences
annotations.translation: 关于对白俄罗斯劳工权利状况进行监测和评估以暂时取消贸易优惠

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 2501/2001 of 10 December 2001 applying a scheme of generalised tariff preferences for the period from 1 January 2002 to 31 December 2004 Statements on a Council Regulation applying a scheme of generalised tariff preferences for the period from 1 January 2002 to 31 December 2004 (¹), and in particular Articles 26 and 29 thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到 2001 年 12 月 10 日理事会 (EC) 第 2501/2001 号条例，关于 2002 年 1 月 1 日至 2004 年 12 月 31 日期间实行普遍关税优惠计划，关于在 2002 年 1 月 1 日至 2004 年 12 月 31 日期间实行普遍关税优惠计划的理事会条例 (¹)，特别是其中第 26 条和第 29 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) The tariff preferences granted under Regulation (EC) No 2501/2001 may be temporarily withdrawn in whole or in part in circumstances including serious and systematic violation of the freedom of association and the right to collective bargaining as defined in the relevant Conventions of the International Labour Organisation (ILO).
annotations.translation: (1) 在包括严重和蓄意侵犯国际劳工组织 (ILO) 有关公约所界定的结社自由和集体谈判权在内的情况下，可暂时全部或部分取消根据 (EC) 第 2501/2001 号条例给予的关税优惠。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) Pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 2501/2001 the Republic of Belarus (hereafter referred to as Belarus) is a beneficiary of generalised tariff preferences.
annotations.translation: (2) 根据 (EC) 第 2501/2001 号条例，白俄罗斯共和国（以下简称白俄罗斯）是普遍关税优惠的受益者。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) On 29 January 2003 , the Commission received information from the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions (ICFTU), the European Trade Union Confederation (ETUC) and the World Confederation of Labour (WCL) on alleged systematic and serious violations of freedom of association in Belarus as defined in ILO Conventions Nos 87 and 98.
annotations.translation: (3) 2003 年 1 月 29 日，委员会收到国际自由工会联合会 (ICFTU)、欧洲工会联合会 (ETUC) 和世界劳工联合会 (WCL) 提交的关于白俄罗斯涉嫌系统性地严重违反国际劳工组织第 87 号和第 98 号公约的结社自由的规定。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) The information put forward was sufficient to justify the opening of an investigation and therefore the Commission decided by a Decision of 29 December 2003 (²) that an investigation should take place.
annotations.translation: (4) 所提供的信息足以证明有理由展开调查，因此，委员会在 2003 年 12 月 29 日的决定 (²) 中决定进行调查。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) The Belarusian authorities were associated with the investigation. The written and oral statements collected by the Commission during the course of the investigation corro
annotations.translation: (5) 白俄罗斯当局参与了调查。委员会在调查过程中收集的书面和口头陈述

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: borate the allegations contained in the information submitted earlier. Belarus is violating the ILO Convention No 87 on Freedom of Association on various major points by impeding the right to freely establish trade union organisations, the right to organise, the free choice of trade union organisations and the obtaining of legal personality of these organisations. Belarus impedes the functioning of trade union organisations, including their reception of financial assistance from international affiliation, and promotes dissolution or suspension of trade unions. The Government of Belarus is also violating Convention No 98 (1949) on the Right to Organise and Collective Bargaining through anti-union discrimination.
annotations.translation: 证实先前提交的信息中的指控。白俄罗斯违反了国际劳工组织关于结社自由的第 87 号公约的多项主要规定，阻碍了自由建立工会组织的权利、组织权、自由选择工会组织以及这些组织获得法人资格的权利。白俄罗斯阻碍工会组织的运作，包括阻碍工会接受国际组织的财政援助，并推动解散或中止工会。此外，白俄罗斯政府的反工会歧视违反了关于“组织和集体谈判权利”的第 98 号公约（1949 年）。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (6) The information available thus provides sufficient grounds to conclude that these violations are serious and systematic and that withdrawal of Belarus ' access to the scheme of generalised preferences is justified. A report on the findings of the investigation was submitted to the Generalised Preferences Committee.
annotations.translation: (6) 因此，现有信息提供了充足的理由，可以得出结论，这些违反行为是严重的和系统性的，撤销白俄罗斯享受普遍优惠的计划是合理的。调查结果的报告已提交给普遍优惠委员会。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (7) In the light of the foregoing, the Commission shall monitor and evaluate the situation with regard to labour rights in Belarus for a period of six months. After the expiry of that period, the Commission intends to submit a proposal to the Council for temporary withdrawal of the trade preferences unless, before the end of the period, Belarus has made a commitment to take the measures necessary to conform within eight months with the principles referred to in the 1998 ILO Declaration on Fundamental Principles and Rights at Work .
annotations.translation: (7) 鉴于上述情况，委员会将监测和评估白俄罗斯的劳工权利状况，为期六个月。在该期限到期之后，委员会打算向理事会提交一份关于暂时取消贸易优惠的提案，除非白俄罗斯在期限结束之前承诺在八个月内采取必要措施，遵守 1998 年劳工组织《关于工作中的基本原则和权利宣言》中提到的原则。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (8) The measures provided for in this Decision are in accordance with the opinion of the Generalised Preferences Committee,
annotations.translation: (8) 本决定规定的措施符合普遍优惠委员会的意见，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS DECIDED AS FOLLOWS:
annotations.translation: 兹决定如下：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Sole Article
annotations.translation: 唯一条款

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. The Commission shall monitor and evaluate the situation in Belarus with regard to ILO conventions Nos 87 and 98 for a period of six months from the publication date of an announcement on the monitoring and evaluation period in the Official Journal of the European Union.
annotations.translation: 1. 委员会应监测和评估白俄罗斯在劳工组织第 87 号和第 98 号公约方面的情况，为期六个月，自在《欧盟官方公报》上公布关于监测和评估期限的公告之日起计算。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (¹) OJ L 346, 31.12.2001, p. 1. Regulation as last amended lation (EC) No 980/2005 (OJ L 169, 30.6.2005, p. 1).
annotations.translation: (¹) OJ L 346，2001 年 12 月 31 日，第 1 页。经 (EC) 第 980/2005 号条例（OJ L 169，2005 年 6 月 30 日，第 1 页）最后修正的条例。
